name: fullstackopen-helsinki2023-pt3
description: My exercises for Part 3 of the University of Helsinki Fullstack course.

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../fullstackopen-helsinki2023/part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../../fullstackopen-helsinki2023-pt3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: 9600bauds
